content.rendered:
February 2, 2023 – Viceroy has sent a letter to MPW’s auditors. We highlight that rudiementary checks on their part would expose severely distressed tenants, a pervasive revenue round-tripping scheme, and uncollectable accrued revenues.

A copy of the letter can be found in the link below.
